mapper.insert: insert into orderItem(id, uid, pid, num, success, lastPrice) values (null, #{user.id}, #{product.id}, #{num}, #{success}, #{lastPrice})
mapper.select: select o.*, p.*, u.*, o.id oid, p.id pid, u.Id uid from orderitem o left join product p on o.pid = p.Id left join user u on o.uid = u.Id and o.Id = #{0} order by time desc
select o.*, p.*, o.id oid, p.id pid from orderitem o left join product p on o.pid = p.Id where o.success = 0 and uid = #{uid} order by time desc
select o.*, p.*, o.id oid, p.id pid from orderitem o left join product p on o.pid = p.Id where o.success = 0;
select o.*, p.*, o.id oid, p.id pid from orderitem o left join product p on o.pid = p.Id where o.success = 1 and o.uid = #{0} order by o.time desc
select o.*, p.*, u.*, o.id oid, p.id pid, u.Id uid from orderitem o left join product p on o.pid = p.Id left join user u on o.uid = u.Id where o.success = 1 order by o.time desc
